attributes.action: Stop stagecoach removing the 151/150 bus from the timetable
attributes.background: Hoghton is a village with a close nit community that has a wide range of ages who heavily rely on the bus service. Without this bus service many young people would not be able to attend education and many older residence may not be able to attend social and medical appointmetments

rejection.details: This is a decision for Stagecoach, not the UK Government or Parliament.
